summary: Admin system deployed with full admin menu/routes and Internet Identity login; user requests adding any missing requested rooms.
architectural_notes: All admin routes are guarded with AdminRouteGuard (full admin access).

existing_features.title: Audit the set of requested admin "rooms" against the currently registered admin routes and admin navigation items, and add any missing rooms so that every requested room is reachable via a working route and visible in the Admin menu without breaking existing room routes.

If there is no dedicated "Rooms" landing page for admins, add an admin-access-guarded page at `/admin/rooms` that shows a responsive grid/list of cards linking to each admin room (using the admin nav items as the source of truth) so admins can access all rooms from one place.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add any missing requested rooms (expand rooms list to match all requested rooms)

projectName: Add missing requested rooms to the admin area
